display_long_description:
Get ready to put your agility to the ultimate test in DodgeCraft, the VR game that blends high-octane fun with a full-body workout! Perfect for fans of Dodgeball, Rugby or Football, DodgeCraft will challenge your evasion and tackling skills like never before!

# Dodge’Em

Face an oncoming asteroid belt and see how long you can dodge and survive! This mode demands quick reflexes and lightning-fast footwork as you weave and duck to avoid dangerous meteorites. It’s not just a game; it’s a full-body exercise that guarantees to leave you breathless!

[media]

# Run The Gauntlet

Defend your zone from relentless robots trying to breach your defenses! Push, shove, punch, and whack these pesky foes off the ledge and into the void of space. They’re tricky opponents, ready to sidestep your every move, so bring your A-game and show them who’s boss!

[media]

With non-stop action, DodgeCraft is all about quick moves, sharp thinking, and exceptional footwork. Are you ready to rise to the challenge?

**Stay Connected on Discord:** Don’t miss exclusive updates, sneak peeks, and a chance to influence the future of DodgeCraft! 
Join Here: https://discord.gg/TC9pZnmmrU
